Posts.Content: Hi  Just wondered if anyone had any recommendations for deodorant while having chemo and radiotherapy?
Posts.Title: Chemo and deodorant

Posts.Content: Hi, I am due to start my FEC chemo on Tuesday but over the past few days I have developed a cold, has anyone been in this position?  Will they still start chemo when you have a cold?  I am hoping it will be cleared up by Tuesday as I don't really want to delay starting chemo.
Posts.Title: Chemo starting Tuesday
